海運業: (かいうんぎょう) - shipping industry; marine transport
海邊: (かいへん) - beach; seashore; seaside; coast
海酸漿: (うみほおずき) - whelk egg case
海開き: (うみびらき) - opening of the beachgoing season
海防: (かいぼう) - coastal defense; coastal defence
海陸風: (かいりくふう) - land and sea breeze
海雀: (ウミスズメ) - murrelet (esp. the ancient murrelet, Synthliboramphus antiquus); roundbelly cowfish (Lactoria diaphana)
海難事故: (かいなんじこ) - accident at sea; maritime accident
海難審判: (かいなんしんぱん) - marine accident inquiry; marine accident enquiry
海難審判庁: (かいなんしんぱんちょう) - Marine Accidents Inquiry Agency
海難救助: (かいなんきゅうじょ) - sea rescue; air-sea rescue; ASR
海雲: (モズク) - mozuku (Cladosiphon okamuranus and Sphaerotrichia divaricata, types of edible seaweed)
海面: (かいめん) - sea level; (surface of) sea
海面上昇: (かいめんじょうしょう) - sea level rise; rise in sea level
海面下: (かいめんか) - below sea level; undersea; beneath the waves
海面変動: (かいめんへんどう) - sea level change
海面更正: (かいめんこうせい) - reduction of mean sea level
海食洞: (かいしょくどう) - sea cave; marine cave
海馬: (アシカ) - eared seal (esp. the California sea lion, Zalophus californianus); sea lion
海馬状隆起: (かいばじょうりゅうき) - hippocampus
海驢: (アシカ) - eared seal (esp. the California sea lion, Zalophus californianus); sea lion
海魚: (かいぎょ) - ocean fish; saltwater fish
海鮮料理: (かいせんりょうり) - cuisine with fresh seafoods
海鮮鍋: (かいせんなべ) - seafood hot pot; seafood stew
海鰐: (ウミワニ) - saltwater crocodile (Crocodylus porosus); estuarine crocodile
海鰓: (ウミエラ) - sea pen (any coelenterate of the family Pennatulidae or related families); sea feather
海鰻: (あなご) - garden eel; conger eel (esp. the common Japanese conger, Conger myriaster)
海鱮: (ウミタナゴ) - sea chub (Ditrema temminckii temminckii)
海鳴: (かいめい) - oceanic noise; rumbling of the sea; mistpouffer
海鳴り: (うみなり) - oceanic noise; rumbling of the sea; mistpouffer
海鴉: (ウミガラス) - common murre; common guillemot (Uria aalge)
海鵜: (ウミウ) - Japanese cormorant (Phalacrocorax capillatus); Temminck's cormorant
海黄: (かいき) - (海気 only) sea air/sea breeze; (海気 only) ocean and atmosphere; type of yarn-dyed silk goods
海鼠: (ナマコ) - (often translated as "sea slug" in anglicized haikus)  sea cucumber (Holothuroidea spp.)
海鼠売: (なまこうり) - selling sea cucumbers; sea cucumber vendor
海鼠売り: (なまこうり) - selling sea cucumbers; sea cucumber vendor
海鼠腸: (このわた) - salted entrails of a sea cucumber; salted entrails of a trepang
浸かる: (つかる) - (esp. 漬かる) to be pickled/to be well seasoned; to be submerged/to be soaked; to be totally immersed (in a condition, e.g. laziness)
浸く: (つく) - to be immersed; (漬く only) to be pickled
浸けっ放し: (つけっぱなし) - soaking something; leaving something to soak
浸ける: (つける) - to soak/to seep/to dip in; (漬ける only) to pickle
浸し物: (ひたしもの) - boiled greens flavored with soy (flavoured)
浸す: (ひたす) - to soak; to dip; to drench
浸みる: (しみる) - to pierce/to penetrate/to soak in/to permeate; (染みる, 沁みる only) to (enter a wound or sensitive area and) sting; to be infected (with vice)/to be steeped (with prejudice)
浸る: (hitaru) - to be soaked in, to be flooded, to be submerged; to be immersed in (alegria, memórias, álcool, etc.), to give oneself over to, to bask in
浸入: (しんにゅう) - infiltration (e.g. of water); flooding
浸出: (しんしゅつ) - infiltration; permeation; exudation; percolation; effusion; extraction
浸潤性腫瘍: (しんじゅんせいしゅよう) - invasive tumor; invasive tumour
浸透: (shintou) - penetration (ex. mercado), pervasion (e.g. thought, ideology); permeation, soaking, osmosis
浸透印: (しんとういん) - self-inking rubber stamp
浸透度: (しんとうど) - degree of penetration; penetrance
浸透探傷検査: (しんとうたんしょうけんさ) - penetrant inspection; PI; penetrant examination; penetrant test
涅槃会: (ねはんえ) - Buddhist service held on the day of Buddha's death (orig. 15th of the 2nd month, now 15th of the 3rd month)
涅槃寂静: (ねはんじゃくじょう) - (yoji)   enlightenment leads to serenity
涅槃経: (ねはんぎょう) - Mahayana Mahaparinirvana Sutra; Nirvana Sutra
涅槃西風: (ねはんにしかぜ) - wind blowing on the day of the Buddhist service held on the day of Buddha's death (15th day of the 2nd month)
涅槃雪: (ねはんゆき) - last snows; snow remaining after the anniversary of Buddha's death
消えうせる: (きえうせる) - to disappear/to vanish; to die
消えうせろ: (きえうせろ) - get lost; get out of my sight; scram; beat it; buzz off; go away
消える: (きえる) - to go out; to vanish; to disappear
